name: Ext_R4_GraphDefinition_start
title: Cross-version Extension for R4.GraphDefinition.start for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents GraphDefinition.start from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/GraphDefinition|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: Type of resource at which the graph starts
element.definition: The type of FHIR resource at which instances of this graph start.
element.comment: `GraphDefinition.start` maps to R4B `GraphDefinition.start`. The value set relationship of  is INCOMPATIBLE for a required binding on a `code` type in this direction. So is mapped as Equivalent.

element.short: Type of resource at which the graph starts
element.definition: The type of FHIR resource at which instances of this graph start.
element.comment: `GraphDefinition.start` maps to R4B `GraphDefinition.start`. The value set relationship of  is INCOMPATIBLE for a required binding on a `code` type in this direction. So is mapped as Equivalent.

binding.description: One of the resource types defined as part of this version of FHIR.
